card.description: Extracted features from a visual dataset showing different shapes.

context.potentialUses: Used to train AI Bot on how to classify shapes.
context.potentialMisuses: Anything other than the purpose above.

sides.description: Number of sides the shape has

symmetry.description: Is the shape symmetric (like flipping it onto itself and it's the same shape)

equal sides.description: Does the shape have all equal sides?

equal angles.description: Does the shape have all equal angles?

background color.description: Color of the background behind the shape
